mapper.select: SELECT b.board_code, b.title, b.id, if(date_format(now(), '%Y %m %d')>date_format(b.write_date, '%Y %m %d'), date_format(b.write_date, '%y/%m/%d'), date_format(b.write_date, '%H:%i')) as dates, b.cnt, count(c.comment_code) as comment_code FROM board as b left join comment as c on b.board_code = c.board_code and c.chk != 1 WHERE b.board_chk = 0 group by b.board_code ORDER BY write_date desc LIMIT #{p.first}, #{p.cnt}
SELECT count(*) FROM board WHERE board_chk=0;
SELECT board_code, id, password, title, content, date_format(write_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T')as write_date, cnt FROM board WHERE board_code=#{board_code}
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET cnt=cnt+1 WHERE board_code=#{board_code}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(id, password, title, content, write_date, cnt, board_chk) VALUES (#{id}, #{password}, #{title}, #{content}, now(), 0, 0)

SELECT max(re_level) FROM comment WHERE board_code=#{board_code}
